title: Boogeymen
overview: This series ventures into small, picturesque towns that have embraced something unusual and fascinating as their main attraction; a local monster! Each episode goes in-depth into the history of these creatures, investigates the places where they have been encountered. and explores the tourist attractions built around the monsters. Hear from believers and skeptics as we investigates the most recent sightings and possibly even catch a glimpse of them ourselves.
